entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing rain early this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
